author: sizur
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

When invoking an application command, created process' arguments should be as they are passed to command on all platforms.  `PS > myapp '{"a": "\n"}'` should result in `myapp`'s `argv[1]`'s value of `"{\"a\": \"\\n\"}"`, regardless of the platform.

This is a breaking change on Windows due to how `CreateProcess` handles `"`.  #9964 will enable selective application of this change per module scope without breaking existing modules behavior.

Related #9968
title: Consistent argument passing to application invocation on all platforms.
